exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce SubstLift to an evaluable reference.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T), TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseVarIsIdentity -> SubstLift

Premises:

Record Traverse (V T : Type) : Type := Build_Traverse { traverse : (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Traverse (_ _)%type_scope Arguments Build_Traverse [V T]%type_scope _%function_scope

SubstVar_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) (H2 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| subst_var := fun (a : V) (k x : nat) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = subst_idx a k x) (eq_ind_r (fun v : V => subst_idx v (0 + k) x = subst_idx a k x) eq_refl (lift_zero 0 a)) (traverse_identifies_var (fun l x0 : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 a) (l + k) x0) 0 x) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseVarIsIdentity -> SubstVar Arguments SubstVar_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}

LiftZero_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| lift_zero := fun (k : nat) (t : V) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = t) eq_refl (traverse_var_is_identity (fun l x : nat => var (lift 0 (l + k) x)) (fun l x : nat => eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => var n = var x) eq_refl (lift_zero (l + k) x)) t 0) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseVarIsIdentity -> LiftZero Arguments LiftZero_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}

Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope

Build_Traverse : forall V T : Type, ((nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T) -> Traverse V T

recognize_subst : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseRelative -> forall traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> ?V) -> nat -> ?T -> ?T, traverse_ = traverse -> forall (v : ?V) (k2 k1 : nat) (t : ?T), traverse_ (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k2) x) k1 t = subst (lift k1 0 v) (k1 + k2) t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?H0 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H1 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T]

```coq
intros V H H0 T H1 HF HI HV.
unfold SubstLift.
pose (Subst_Traverse V H H0 T H1) as S.
apply (Build_SubstLift T _ V S).
intros v k t.
unfold Subst_Traverse, S.
simpl.
rewrite <- (traverse_var_is_identity V H _).
- apply recognize_subst.
  + apply HF.
  + apply HI.
  + apply Build_TraverseRelative.
    intros f g p t1 m l Hfg Heq.
    subst m.
    induction t1 using traverse_ind.
    reflexivity.
  + apply Build_TraverseRelative.
    intros f g p t1 m l Hfg Heq.
    subst m.
    induction t1 using traverse_ind.
    reflexivity.
- intros l x.
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros V H H0 T H1 HF HI HV. unfold SubstLift. pose (Subst_Traverse V H H0 T H1) as S. apply (Build_SubstLift T _ V S). intros v k t. unfold Subst_Traverse, S. simpl. rewrite <- (traverse_var_is_identity V H _). - apply recognize_subst. + apply HF. + apply HI. + apply Build_TraverseRelative. intros f g p t1 m l Hfg Heq. subst m. induction t1 using traverse_ind. reflexivity. + apply Build_TraverseRelative. intros f g p t1 m l Hfg Heq. subst m. induction t1 using traverse_ind. reflexivity. - intros l x. reflexivity.
